Package ca.phon.app.welcome

Class WelcomeWindow

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
java.awt.Window
java.awt.Frame
javax.swing.JFrame
ca.phon.ui.CommonModuleFrame
ca.phon.app.welcome.WelcomeWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
IExtendable, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class WelcomeWindow
extends CommonModuleFrame
implements IExtendable
Entry window for the application. This window provides access to common project actions - create, browse, extract, preferences, recent projects, and workspace setup.
See Also:
Serialized Form
